name: BackFlipped
description:
Fall to bottom to flip to the back, then fall back up on the other side... How long can you keep switching between the back and front of the stage? Game by Tom Hermans (@Auroriax) for js13k-2019.

How to play (Arrow keys/WASD/ZQSD/Swipes):
🡸 🡺 Left/Right: Kick, 🡹 Up: Jump, 🡻 Down: Drop.
Touched platforms increase score and move to background. Reach bottom of level to flip to the backside! You lose when time runs out...
